content: 36 sts 13 sts change to brown yarn and fasten_off white yarn single_crochet in 11 sts r7 single_crochet in 12 sts change to white yarn and fasten_off brown yarn single_crochet in 4 sts r11 single_crochet in 11 sts change to white change to brown yarn and fasten_off yarn and fasten_off brown yarn single_crochet in white yarn single_crochet in 4 sts change to 13 sts change to brown yarn and white yarn and fasten_off brown yarn fasten_off white yarn single_crochet in 11 sts single_crochet in 4 sts change to brown yarn and 4 put the safety eyes above the last round with 3 sts away from the edges of the color change with around 7 sts in between cut about 10 25cm of orange yarn and stitch on the beak centered in between the eyes 5 r12 single_crochet in 12 sts change to white yarn and fasten_off brown yarn single_crochet in cut about 14 35cm of white yarn 11 sts change to brown yarn and stitch on four v s centered on the fasten_off white yarn single_crochet in 12 sts front on the round above r13-15 single_crochet in each st around 3 rounds r16 single_crochet in each st around r17 *decrease* to last st single_crochet in st 18 sts stitch on three v s centered on the front on the round above 6 start stuffing r18 single_crochet in each st around r19 *decrease* around 9 sts slip_stitch in next st finish stuffing fasten_off leaving a tail thread yarn onto yarn needle and insert the needle through the front loop of each stitch pull the tail tight ears make 2 with brown yarn r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring r2 single_crochet in each st around r3 *2 single_crochet in st single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat to end 8 sts r4 single_crochet to the last st 2 single_crochet in st 9 sts slip_stitch in next st don t stuff fasten_off leaving a tail sew ears onto the head 7 wing s make 2 long tail for sewing top middle with brown yarn with brown yarn r1 chain 4 skip st single_crochet in next 2 chain 2 single_crochet r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring in last st rotate work to work on the underside of the foundation chain single_crochet r2 *2 single_crochet in st single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat in next 2 chain 6 sts to end 8 sts r2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a 8 sew the top piece to the middle one bottom sew the middle piece to the bottom with brown yarn piece r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring weave in all the ends in the back of the work slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a tail edging for the left wing single_crochet on the
